summary: SummaryTurn up the volume with this easy-to-use blow dryer brush. L'ange's Multi-Volume Series combines a hair dryer and a style-sculpting thermal brush. Tug-resistant bristles grip the hair, giving you just the right amount of tension to create smooth styles with incredible body and lift.
details: DetailsBenefitsEasy barrel head replacement mechanismAdds volume to hair like a salon-style blowoutSimplifies drying & stylingIonic technology reduces frizzBoosts smoothness & shineFeaturesCombination synthetic and nylon bristlesEasy-twist handle with LED indicator3 settings: cool, low, & highProfessional length 360Â° swivel cordIncludes protective cover & cleaning brushItem 2641949How To UseRemove the cover from barrel heads before turning on.Plug the unit into an electrical outlet.Twist the temperature control dial at the base of the handle from OFF to your desired setting (indicated by the LED light).LOW setting is ideal for fine hair, HIGH setting is best for thick/coarse/textured hair, and COOL setting is best for enhancing shine and locking in your style.Once you are finished styling, unplug brush dryer and wait until completely cooled before storing away in a dry place.How To Change Barrel Head: Before changing barrel heads, wait for the barrel head to cool completely. To remove the barrel, push down on the lever found at the back of the handle, and turn the barrel so the unlock symbol aligns with the arrow located just above the lever. To insert a new barrel, place it onto the handle, and turn until locked in place.Cleaning & Storage: To protect bristles, place the tool upright or lay over the side of the counter. After it's completely cooled, remove trapped debris with the cleaning brush and then cover with the protective cover before storing.Styling Instructions:After washing hair, towel dry to remove excess water.Apply your L'ange heat protectant of choice.Detangle hair prior to styling.Begin styling once hair is approximately 70% dry.Section and clip additional pieces of hair up and out of the way.Working with a manageable section, place brush dryer underneath the hair, near the roots.Hold for 2-3 seconds at your root, and working in a downward motion, slowly rotate the hair around the barrel of the brush dryer as you work from root to tip.Continue until the section is dry (make sure to keep tool moving at all times).If any sections near the root remain damp, insert brush dryer and hold for an additional 2-3 seconds, or until dry.To create soft curls or add shape to layers, hold the brush vertically and spin in place.Select the cool setting and run brush dryer through your hair to help lock-in the style.
how_to_use: Remove the cover from barrel heads before turning on.Plug the unit into an electrical outlet.Twist the temperature control dial at the base of the handle from OFF to your desired setting (indicated by the LED light).LOW setting is ideal for fine hair, HIGH setting is best for thick/coarse/textured hair, and COOL setting is best for enhancing shine and locking in your style.Once you are finished styling, unplug brush dryer and wait until completely cooled before storing away in a dry place.How To Change Barrel Head: Before changing barrel heads, wait for the barrel head to cool completely. To remove the barrel, push down on the lever found at the back of the handle, and turn the barrel so the unlock symbol aligns with the arrow located just above the lever. To insert a new barrel, place it onto the handle, and turn until locked in place.Cleaning & Storage: To protect bristles, place the tool upright or lay over the side of the counter. After it's completely cooled, remove trapped debris with the cleaning brush and then cover with the protective cover before storing.Styling Instructions:After washing hair, towel dry to remove excess water.Apply your L'ange heat protectant of choice.Detangle hair prior to styling.Begin styling once hair is approximately 70% dry.Section and clip additional pieces of hair up and out of the way.Working with a manageable section, place brush dryer underneath the hair, near the roots.Hold for 2-3 seconds at your root, and working in a downward motion, slowly rotate the hair around the barrel of the brush dryer as you work from root to tip.Continue until the section is dry (make sure to keep tool moving at all times).If any sections near the root remain damp, insert brush dryer and hold for an additional 2-3 seconds, or until dry.To create soft curls or add shape to layers, hold the brush vertically and spin in place.Select the cool setting and run brush dryer through your hair to help lock-in the style.

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: Nice product but parts were missing.  Not the first time this has happened.

reviews.headline: Better than high end
reviews.comments: I got this after my amika one stopped turning on after only 3 months of weekly use. Told myself i would never spend a lot of money on a luxary hot tool again. This one turned out to be BETTER than the amika. It does not tug on my hair or get caught in the bristles (fine thin hair for reference). There is no weird smell and it doesnt get too hot even on the highest heat setting so my hair isnt frying off. Its lasted longer than the amika and its still going strong. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a reliable hair brush dryer that doesnt break the bank.

reviews.headline: Perfect for going from curly to straight hair
reviews.comments: I have 3B to 3C curly hair and this product is the one thing I've been missing to make my life so much easier! It usually takes me hours to blowdry all of my thick curls but I genuinely was able to completely straighten my curls in about 20 minutes with this product. I did go in with a flat iron at my roots but this blow dryer brush really gives you that salon blow out look! I like that I can get results fast without using heat on my hair for hours!! Curly girls, give this a try!

reviews.headline: Sad face :(
reviews.comments: I bought this to replace my black one because some of the bristles have become flattemed over the years. Not even 2 minutes after turning it on it made a loud sound and completely stopped working with a weird smell.  I'll be returning it to my local Ulta and hopefully they can order me another one.  I want to give it another chance.

reviews.headline: The one missing tool from my set!!!
reviews.comments: I'm so happy with this product! It was the one missing tool from my set. I've always had a tough time using a round brush and blowdryer, this is very easy to use. I was worried the wand would be too heavy and thick, but it was effortless and light.
